form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE, Form G-28

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE DATE In re: 1/12/1990 FILE No. IMMIGRATION MATTERS I hereby enter my appearance as attorney for (or representative of), and at the request of, the following named person(s): NAME Petitioner Applicant Beneficiary Zhumkhawala. Farida ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number & Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 1747 Blossom Hill Rd. San Jose, CA 95124 NAME Petitioner Applicant Nooruddin M. Tapal Beneficiary ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number & Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 46/B Maulvi Tamizuddin Rd. Lalazar Karachi Pakistan Check Applicable Item(s) below: xx I am an attorney and a member in good standing of the bar of the Supreme Court of the United States or of the highest court of the following State, territory, insular possession, or District of Columbia California Supreme Court and/or Appellate Division of New York Supreme Court and am not under a (Name of Court) court or administrative agency order suspending, enjoining, restraining, disbarring, or otherwise restricting me in practicing law. 2. I am on accredited representative of the following named religious, charitable, social service, or similar organization established in the United States and which is so recognized by the Board: 3. I am associated with , the attorney of record who previously filed a notice of appearance in this case and my appearance is at his request. (If you check this item, also check item 1 or 2 whichever is appropriate.) 4. Others (Explain fully.) SIGNATURE COMPLETE ADDRESS Edwar LAW OFFICES OF EDWARD M. WEISZ 8383 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite 652 Beverly Hills, California 90211 NAME (Type or Print) TELEPHONE NUMBER EDWARD M. WEISZ 213-652-4602 PURSUANT TO THE PRIVACY ACT OF 1974, I HEREBY CONSENT TO THE DISCLOSURE TO THE FOLLOWING NAMED ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE OF ANY RECORD PERTAINING TO ME WHICH APPEARS IN ANY IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE SYSTEM OF RECORDS: EDWARD M. WEISZ (Name of Attomey or Representative) THE ABOVE CONSENT TO DISCLOSE IS IN CONNECTION WITH THE FOLLOWING MATTER: NAME OF PERSON CONSENTING SIGNATURE OF PERSON CONSENTING DATE 1/12/90 Farida Zhumkhawala NOTE: Execution of this box is required under the Privacy Act of 1974 where the person being represented is a citizen of the United States or an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.) Form G-28 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE (Rev.10-25-79)N Immigration and Naturalization Service
